★★ THE TIME IS NOW. STOP OVERPAYING. RECLAIM MORE GREEN FOR YOURSELF! ★★

GreenValueHost is a leading Illinois-based provider of budget virtual private server hosting services, hosting over 4,000 happy customers with available servers in 6 worldwide locations: Buffalo, Atlanta, Chicago, Dallas, Los Angeles, and Amsterdam. We operate from premium tier-1 networks and serve a worldwide client base. Our available product/services lines are engineered to suit needs for any purpose use, big or small. In addition, we also offer FREE enterprise DDoS protection (protected on multiple layers, both on the network and server level) up to 19Gbps for all services purchased in our Amsterdam location.

For a limited time only to celebrate our most recent product line relaunches (Amsterdam location & shared hosting services), we have VERY SPECIAL promotions available throughout the month of November!

Don't miss out - It's an amazing opportunity to save big on already dirt cheap prices!

LIMITED TIME ONLY PROMOTIONS*: NOW VALID UNTIL NOVEMBER 30

1) Save 45% OFF RECURRING + RECEIVE TRIPLE BANDWIDTH** + DOUBLE DISK SPACE + DOUBLE RAM + 3 EXTRA IPs** on ANY VPS when paying YEARLY

Coupon Code: NOVVPSPROMO1

2) Save 30% OFF RECURRING + RECEIVE TRIPLE BANDWIDTH** + DOUBLE DISK SPACE + 3 EXTRA IPs** on ANY VPS when paying SEMI-YEARLY

Coupon Code: NOVVPSPROMO2

3) Save 25% OFF RECURRING + RECEIVE TRIPLE BANDWIDTH* + DOUBLE DISK SPACE + DOUBLE RAM + 2 EXTRA IPs* on ANY VPS when paying QUARTERLY

Coupon Code: NOVVPSPROMO3

* Does not apply to the November exclusive Managed VPS plan
** Triple bandwidth / additional IPs do not apply to virtual servers purchased in Amsterdam
